bioconda.name: bioconductor-arrayqualitymetrics
bioconda.summary: Quality metrics report for microarray data sets

biotools.summary: This package generates microarray quality metrics reports for data in BioConductor microarray data containers (ExpressionSet, NChannelSet, AffyBatch). One and two color array platforms are supported.

bioschemas.name: arrayQualityMetrics
bioschemas.summary: This package generates microarray quality metrics reports for data in BioConductor microarray data containers (ExpressionSet, NChannelSet, AffyBatch). One and two color array platforms are supported.
